mapper.select: SELECT sum(fbcl.changing_amount_) changing_amount_, fbcl.category_id_, ffc.name_ FROM fc_book_change_log fbcl, fc_financial_category ffc, fc_book_subject fbs WHERE fbcl.category_id_ = ffc.id_ AND ffc.type_ = 1 AND fbcl.record_id_ = fbs.id_ AND fbcl.target_ = 'received_amount_' and fbcl.flow_biz_id_ = #{flow_biz_id_} GROUP BY fbcl.category_id_, ffc.name_
